Package model

Class Character

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Element
model.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
BomberMan, Enemy
public abstract class Character extends Element
model of character class
Author:
Matteo

    static final int

    TIME_FOR_MOVEMENT
    time it takes a character to move (affected by its speed)

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(int[] position, double speed, int lives)
      constructor
      Parameters:
      position - the initial position of a character
      speed - the initial speed of a character. can change for bomberman
      lives - initial number of lives of a character

    • move

      public boolean move(Direction direction)
      move the character
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction the character is moving in
      Returns:
      true if the character has moved, false otherwise

    • loseLife

      public void loseLife()
      decrease the amount of lives of a character. if it reaches 0, the character dies.

    • becomeInvincible

      public void becomeInvincible()
      make the character invincible. schedule its return to being mortal after INVINCIBILITY_TIME milliseconds

    • die

      public void die()
      remove a character from the game board
